job_details.degree_required: Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field

jd: From: alka, Allied Business Consulting alka@abcinc-us.com Reply to: alka@abcinc-us.com Position : Java Developer.Location : Sunnyvale, CA.we need h1b transfer to our company, usc or gc or gc-ead or l2-ead or h4-ead - our w-2 for our companyClient: WalmartWork Mode Hybrid ( 2 days in Office )Ideal Candidate Must-Haves:• Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field and 10 years’ experience building scalable ecommerce applications• 10 or more years of experience programming in Java/J2EE, Azure Cloud, Cosmos DB, REST Services, Apache and Tomcat10 or more years experience building services and using Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) Preferred Qualifications • Hands on development on building n-tier applications using RESTful Services, Java/J2EE, Oracle and related technologies• Experience with Eclipse. Experience with GIT, and Ant or Maven is a plus• Experience configuring & deploying applications on J2EE application server (Apache Tomcat, WebLogic, WebSphere) a plus• Experience with UNIX shell and scriptingExperience in K8• Experience in building/implementing high performance & a scalable system is a plus.• Knowledge of standard tools for optimizing and testing code.• Ability to operate effectively and independently in a dynamic, fluid environment
